title: T206 need Var.'s - Browne (Wash.), Elberfield, Lundgren
author: FFIMARRIOTT

posts.post_title: T206 need Var.'s - Browne (Wash.), Elberfield, Lundgren
posts.post_content:
Ok, I was doing the happy dance thinking I had all 520 cards of the T206set (excluding the Big Four of course). Since it has been 30 years since I got my first T206 card, I had to count them again, log them again, yada yada yada - I'm a few short. Anyway, I am currently looking for the below VARIATION cards in either raw condition, or, from a graded 1-3 (or 10-30). Please send pics of front and back, along with your one-shot best price. I can pay via PP (FF option) or similar.

♦ Dahlen (Brooklyn)
♦ Elberfield (Portrait; Washington)
♦ Lundgren (Chicago)

As soon as I am ready to give up the kids' college fund <grin> I will look for the other 2 that I needs (Demmitt and O'Hara; both St. Louis).

Thanks!!

Michael (mflynn@elitevaletservices.com)
